channel.title: Help with Rock IDs
channel.description:
I am Making my Mining and Smithing area and i allmost have a complete lest of all the Rocks IDs If someone could help me with the last few that would be great!
[code] Rock---ID Rune---106 Addy---2105 Mith---2102 Gold---2099 Coal---2097 Silver ---2101 Iron---2093 Tin---2095 Copper---2090 Clay---2109 Limestone---4027 Blurite---2110 Essence---??? Gems---???[/code]
I need to know the Object ID of the Rock that you mine to get Gems, [s]Blurite[/s], and Essence.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 21, 2008, 11:16:14 pm[/size][hr]WOW no one knows.....
